products.name: Dustbin Liners
products.fullDesc:
Dustbin Liners


Quantity: 1 roll ( 30 bags )


Size: 19’x21’x20′ micron


Colour: Green


Properties:



  • Made from Corn

  • Light weight

  • Perforated

  • 100% Biodegradable & Compostable

  • Plastic free

  • Eco-friendly


Uses:



  • Can be used in Kitchen, Office, Canteen, Pantry, Hospitals, Salons, Pet care areas

  • Liner for filling Kitchen waste, garden waste, food leftovers, dog & cat poop , litter.


Features:



  • Decomposes when water, sunlight, food waste comes in contact with liner

  • When stored in normal temperature, does not decompose till a year.

products.name: Vermi Compost
products.shortDesc: Manure made by earthworms that nourishes the soil , prevents top soil from getting hard, keeps soil moist for longer time.

Vermi Compost

products.fullDesc:
Earthworms


We supply Eisenia Foetida breed of earthworms used for vermicomposting.


Qty: 1 KG.

products.name: Bioculture
products.fullDesc:
Bioculture



Contents:


  • Lactic acid bacteria

  • Photosynthetic bacteria

  • Yeast

Precautions:



  • Don’t mix composting culture with pesticides, fungicides & chiorinated water.

  • Store in cool, dry place away from sunlight.

  • Bacterial liquid culture for kitchen and garden waste composting projects

Qty: 1 Ltr.
